resources.string:
My name is Xavier. 

 I love to play video games. 
 My favorite kind of games are strategy/role playing games and racing games. 
 I would say my favorite strategy/role playing games are fire emblem and pokemon 
 My favorite racing game is Mario Kart 8 Deluxe 
 I also like to play multiplayer/party games and even fighting games 
 Some I like to play include Smash Bros, Mario Party, DB FighterZ, and Mario and Sonic at the Olympic Games 

 Aside from gaming on nintendo I also like to game on playstation 
 Some playstation games I like are God of War, Ghost of Tsushima, Spider-Man, and Monster Hunter World. 

 I also like to watch movies. 
 My favorite movie character is Godzilla (hes more of a monster than a character but you get the point). 
 My favorite Godzilla movie is Godzilla King of the Monsters (2019). 
 I'd even say that it's one of my favorite movies of all time 

 I also love to listen to music 

 I also like to eat food and have a really big appetite ;).
